title.@value: Fetus or newborn affected by polyhydramnios

definition.@value: Polyhydramnios is defined as an abnormally large volume of amniotic fluid within the uterus. An amount of 2 L at term, any single pool >8cm or an amniotic fluid index (AFI) > 24 cm is considered to be polyhydramnios.

label.@value: fetus or newborn affected by hydramnios
Fetus or newborn affected by polyhydramnios
